value:
Hey, why not summon some more
Heroes to help us out? Then we can
clear this area out like it's nothing!$k$p...Pretty good idea, right?

The nobles are a pack of villains.
The resistance aims to protect the
people from their corruption.

What's with the grim face? You have
my strength and my ear whenever
you need, all right?

They say the body's a temple, so
let's build that temple so big, gods
will be forced to take notice!

I want to build a home for those who
lost theirs to war... It won't be easy,
but I'll get there. Just watch.

As I'd heard... You've got the look of
a leader, $Nu.

It'll be curtains for anyone who
crosses my path. Doesn't matter
WHO they are!

Yeah, not too shabby. Just gotta
keep moving forward.
Damn. I must be slipping...

Hey, thanks. Looking forward to using
this in our next battle!

Hey, I'm Echidna. Need someone to
help you build out your settlement
here? All you have to do is ask.

Have you thought about what you'll
do once all the fighting's over and
done with, $Nu?$k$pIf you don't have any plans, why not
come with me and help us rebuild?
It's hard work, but it's rewarding.$k$pThe power of your divine weapon
leads many to flock to your side,
but your true gift is leadership.$k$pIt'd be a shame for someone with
your patience and character to go
to waste, or so I think...$k$pAt any rate, it'll have to wait. In the
meantime, I hope you'll consider it.
Just...don't disappoint me!
はあっ
でやあ！
うっ…
やるね…！
You aren't ready!
What a pity...
Giving up? Not me.
Don't try to run!
Don't...give up...
*chuckle*
I'm Echidna, leader of the Western Isles resistance. Good to meet you.
Hm? Looking for a training partner? Well, look no further.
Imagine it—a free village, accepting of everyone... My dream is to make that a reality.
Our bard Elffin has a few secrets... But it's not my place to share them.
Larum's cooking is best avoided. Even talking about leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
Without effort, there can be no peace... I must keep at it.
We've all traveled far to be here, so please, don't shoulder this world's burdens alone.
Right!
That so?
Been waiting for this.
